author: Shamani Joshi, Dhvani Solani
title: As Coronavirus Spreads So Does Single-Use Plastic. Here’s What That Means for Our Environment
description: As oil prices rapidly drop, recycling centers remain shut and plastic personal protective equipment becomes biohazard waste, the pandemic could worsen the already serious plastic pollution problem.
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE India.
